title: Bride of Second Chances
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B0058NWYWQJeremy Graham made a promise to Rebecca that he would never love another woman. After her death, her sister, Jane Syas, is about to be forced into marrying a man she can’t tolerate. Out of a sense of duty to help Rebecca’s younger sister, Jeremy steps in to give her his name and home.  But Jane, who has always been shy and content to hide in the shadows, begins to stir up old feelings—feelings Jeremy isn’t prepared for. Will a marriage that began out of obligation and necessity give a lonely widower a second chance? Or will he be bound to keep his promise to Rebecca?  *This historical romance is part of the South Dakota series. It can also be read as a stand-alone novel.  #1 Loving Eliza #2 Bid for a Bride #3 Bride of Second Chances
author: Ruth Ann Nordin
